mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.id,p.parent_id,p.name,p.label,p.code,p.url,p.type, p.icon,p.remark,p.path,p.is_home,p.order_num FROM user AS u LEFT JOIN user_role AS ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN role AS r ON ur.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN role_permission AS rp ON rp.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN permission AS p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.order_num ASC
SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM permission p JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id JOIN role sr ON rp.role_id = sr.id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} ORDER BY p.id
